Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Civil Service and Labor
A Local Law in relation to creating a nuclear disarmament and nuclear weapons-free zone advisory committee
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Creating a nuclear disarmament and nuclear weapons-free zone advisory committee.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York City Comptroller to instruct the pension funds of public employees in New York City to divest from and avoid any financial exposure to companies involved in the production and maintenance of nuclear weapons, reaffirming New York City as a Nuclear Weapons Free Zone, and joining the ICAN Cities Appeal and calling on the United States to support and join the Treaty on the Prohibition of Nuclear Weapons
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: NYC Comptroller to instruct the pension funds of public employees in NYC to divest from and avoid any financial exposure to companies involved in the production and maintenance of nuclear weapons.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Louis, Adams, Dromm and Moya

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to creating a nuclear disarmament and nuclear weapons-free zone advisory committee
